name: Kill From There
description:
Made for ScoreSpace game jam #10

Kill from there is a retro spaceship game, where there is an arrow indicating where you will score the most. Survive hordes in eight directions to get the highest score!

Controls

W - Move Up

A - Move Left

S - Move Down

D - Move Right

UpArrow - Shoot Up

DownArrow - Shoot Down

LeftArrow - Shoot Left

RightArrow - Shoot Right
